about_the_game:
Neko's Rage is a very dynamic 2D action game in which you play as a cyborg. Fight hordes of robots and collect more resources to improve your character, your equipments and to restore your hub.
Rush to explode the bio-robotic creatures which are spreading more and more quickly in the differents biomes, the more time passes and the more hostile the environment becomes.

A post apocalyptic future

In 2130 human beings become obsolete and unadapted to the world's pandemic and climatic conditions, bio-mechanical creatures have become the dominant species, but to awaken they need one of the last biological sources of energy on earth , the humans ...
Neko Units are invented to fight and free captive humans of the machines's incubation nests.

Gameplay and a lot of action

You will gain powers with a lots of upgrades and equipments to buy in Gentech's laboratory but also in battle's stages with a lots of differents capacities amplificators or by killing enemies without taking damage.

The Neko-chain

A chain counter that totals the number of enemies killed in a row, this influences the player's luck rate and allows you to obtain more items and better qualities in chests or by killing enemies.

The overheat and enraged mode

When the destruction of enemies is linked without being hit your character will go into enraged mode, increased critical hit rate, more speed and the possibility of cross dash attacks to generate even more damage and experience.

Stage procedural building

The stages are proceduraly generated to make every run different and fun.


Find cracked walls for more resources


Find invisible chest


Fight dangerous foes


Buy upgrades and equipment at Gentech


Test your skill to collect more resources

name: Neko's Rage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX560
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Neko's Rage is a pixel art rogue-lite platformer set in a post apocalyptic future overrun with dangerous biomechanical robots. Play as the cyber Neko-01 unit and collect always more loots to upgrade your Hub and character.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
